sentences.en: Cottonwood, maple, pinewood, birch , miscellaneous tree, trimmed log or heart wood of clamp - shaft remained.
sentences.cn: 杨木, 枫木,松木, 榆木, 杂木, 修直以后的原木或有卡剩下的木芯.

sentences.en: Its banks were shaded by cottonwood and redwood trees.
sentences.cn: 河流的两岸被棉花树和红木树遮蔽住了。

trans.tran_en: a North American tree with seeds that look like white cotton
